metadata.title: CVE-2021-45082 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Cobbler before 3.3.1. In the templar.py file,the function check_for_invalid_imports can allow Cheetah code to importPython modules via the "#from MODULE import" substring. (Only linesbeginning with #import are blocked.)

criterions.comment: cobbler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
